extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board:

    managing the underlying data and work with Graphics to draw on canvas, in order to update the look of the board.

    • Method Detail

      • getNCovered

        public int getNCovered​()
        Return the number of mines still covered.
        Returns:
        the number of mines still covered.

      • uncoverCell

        public boolean uncoverCell​(int row,
                           int col,
                           java.awt.Graphics g)
        Parameter The first Step to uncover a cell. A primary check is performed first to see if unveiling this cell will end the game. If so, the game is stopped, else, a Bread-first search will be performed on the concerning cell and auto expand the region if needed.

        Note that Graphics g is not manually disposed in this method, instead it should be disposed by the caller , the constructor of graphics. The game may end by this method.

        Parameters:
        row - row index of the cell
        col - column index of the cell
        g - Graphics object to draw with
        Returns:
        true if successfully uncover a mine, end the game, or uncover a region; false if hit a mine, lose the game or click on an invalid cell

      • inferOnCell

        public boolean inferOnCell​(int row,
                           int col,
                           java.awt.Graphics g)
        Inferring on the cell on an LR click callback. The game may end by this method calling uncover
        Parameters:
        row - row index of the cell
        col - column index of the cell
        g - Graphics obejct to draw with
        Returns:
        true if can infer and expand; false if click on invalid cells or lack conditions to auto uncover

        public void restoreTempUNC0​(int row,

                            java.awt.Graphics g)
        Restore the appearance of temporarily marked as UNC0 cells. Use di0 and dj0, need to blink the center cell as well.
        Parameters:
        row -
        col -
        g -

      • toggleFlag

        public int toggleFlag​(int row,
                      int col,
                      java.awt.Graphics g)
        Flag or un-flag a cell.
        Parameters:
        row - row index
        col - column index
        g - Graphics object to draw with
        Returns:
        the change of mines remaining to be discovered. -1 if flag a cell; 1 if unflag a cell; 0 if not viable.
